attr.name: Values
attr.content: [ repeat-x | repeat-y | [ repeat | space | round | no-repeat ]{1,2} ]#

attr.name: Applies to
attr.content: All elements (in SVG, applies to all graphics elements and all container elements except the <defs>element)

attr.name: Note
attr.content: The keywords for mask-repeat are reproduced from background-repeat and have the same behaviors
